Room.Name: Thieve's Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a low and narrow crawlway known as the thieve's passage.
Room.LongDescription: Many years ago a number of thieves escaped from their prison cells and were found here, but no one has ever been willing to crawl through the darkness to see where it goes in the western direction. A major tunnel is just to the northeast. It's probably not right to call this narrow crawlway a passage. It's more like a rat's run.
